# Water (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* | Aegir, Njord |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* | The Devourer |
| | *Golarion:* | [[Gozreh]], Pharasma |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Obad-Hai]] |
| | *Kalamar:* | Mother of the Elements, The Stone Lord, Creator of Strife |
| | *Krynn:* | Habbakuk. Zeboim |
| | *Olympian:* | Poseidon |
| | *Other:* | Taiia (destroyer aspect) |
| | *Pharaonic:* | Isis, Sobek |
| | *Toril:* | [[Deep Sashelas]], Eldath, Isis, Istishia, Sebek, Silvanus, Umberlee |

**Granted Powers**: You can manipulate water and mist and ice, conjure creatures of water, and resist cold.

- *Icicle (Sp)*: As a standard action, you can fire an icicle from your finger, targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. The icicle deals 1d6 points of cold damage + 1 point for every two cleric levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
- *Cold Resistance (Ex)*: At 6th level, you gain resist cold 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain immunity to cold.

**Water Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Obscuring Mist (Spell)|Obscuring Mist]]****:** Fog surrounds you.

**  ** **[[Metamorphose Liquids (Spell)|Metamorphose Liquids]]****:** Transform one liquid into another. Magical liquids cannot be created. Poisons may be rendered harmless.

**2** **[[Fog Cloud (Spell)|Fog Cloud]]****:** Fog obscures vision.

**3** **[[Water Breathing (Spell)|Water Breathing]]****:** Subjects can breathe underwater.

**4** **[[Control Water (Spell)|Control Water]]****:** Raises or lowers bodies of water.

**5** **[[Ice Storm (Spell)|Ice Storm]]****:** Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

**6** **[[Cone of Cold (Spell)|Cone of Cold]]****:** 1d6/level cold damage.

**7** **[[Elemental Body IV (Spell)|Elemental Body IV]]****:** Turns you into a Huge elemental. (water spell only)

**8** **[[Horrid Wilting (Spell)|Horrid Wilting]]****:** Deals 1d6/level damage within 30 ft.

**9** **[[Elemental Swarm (Spell)|Elemental Swarm]]****:** Summons multiple elementals. (water spell only)
